channel.title: Canal Plus on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Canal Plus on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Canal+ Gets Approval to Acquire African Pay-TV Group Multichoice
item.description: South Africa’s competition tribunal clears the Canal+ takeover of MultiChoice, with local ownership safeguards and content funding pledges included.
